General.Name: Lutian Machinery Co Ltd
General.Description: Lutian Machinery Co., Ltd. engages in the research, design, development, production, and sale of general power machinery and high-pressure washers in China. It offers generators, water pumps, engines, consumer and commercial washers, and pressure washer and power equipment accessories. It also exports its products to Europe, South America, North America, Africa, the Middle East, Southeast Asia, and internationally. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Taizhou, China.
